remarks: Ring homomorphisms preserve subtraction.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 15-Jun-2011.)
statement:
rnghomsub.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
rnghomsub.2 $e |- X = ran G $.
rnghomsub.3 $e |- H = ( /g ` G ) $.
rnghomsub.4 $e |- J = ( 1st ` S ) $.
rnghomsub.5 $e |- K = ( /g ` J ) $.
rngohomsub $p |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S e. RingOps /\ F e. ( R RngHom S ) ) /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( F ` ( A H B ) ) = ( ( F ` A ) K ( F ` B ) ) ) $.
